com.vectorprint.report.running

Interface ReportBuilder<ARGS,RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • Type Parameters:
    RD - the type of data for the report
    ARGS - the type of arguments for building the report
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReportRunner, ThreadSafeReportBuilder

    public interface ReportBuilder<ARGS,RD extends ReportDataHolder>
    A report can be build by an implementor by calling buildReport(java.lang.Object) which in turn can/should use a DataCollector and a ReportGenerator to build the report.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      int buildReport(ARGS args, OutputStream out)

      ReportGenerator<RD> getReportGenerator()
